hydroai.hydromodel module

class hydroai.hydromodel.HydroModel(settings, serialized_text=None)[source]

Bases: object

A HydroModel instance contains infomation of one trained model

model_params

parameters for this model, include model type, global settings and sigopt parameters

Type

dict

model

model saved path

Type

str

metrics

metrics used to communicate with sigopt for finding best model, maybe ‘AUC’, ‘MAP’, ‘training_time’, etc

Type

list

sigopt_experiment_id

If this model is trained with sigopt, record its history sigopt experiment id

Type

str

model_parameters

model parameters used to train this model, can be parameter suggested by sigopt or user defined.

Type

dict

explain()[source]

Explain this model

load_json(serialized_text)[source]

Load serialized text to HydroModel

We will use Json format to store HydroModel in HydroDB, this method is used to deserialize Json

Parameters

serialized_text (str) –

to_json()[source]

serialize HydroModel to json

We will use Json format to store HydroModel in HydroDB, this method is used to serialize HydroModel

Returns

out

Return type

str

update(info={})[source]

This method is used to update current HydroModel

Parameters

info (dict:) – example info as {‘model’: ‘saved_model_path’, ‘metrics’: [‘AUC’: 8.2127], ‘sigopt_experiment_id’: ‘xxxx’, ‘model_parameters’: {‘learning_rt’: 3}}
